name: Obsidian Markdown Formatter
description: Apply Markdown formatting to selected text

actions.title: Bold
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `**${line}**`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Italic
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `_${line}_`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Underline
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `<u>${line}</u>`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Strikethrough
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `~~${line}~~`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Highlight
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `==${line}==`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Inline Code
actions.javascript: popclip.pasteText('`' + popclip.input.text + '`');

actions.title: Blockquote
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `> ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: H1
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `# ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: H2
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `## ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: H3
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `### ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: H4
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `#### ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: H5
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `##### ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Bullet List
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `- ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Numbered List
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); let counter = 1; const formatted = lines.map(line => `${counter++}. ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Task List (Unchecked)
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `* [ ] ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Task List (Checked)
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `* [x] ${line}`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Horizontal Line
Back Link
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `[[${line}]]`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Markdown Link
actions.javascript: const lines = popclip.input.text.split('\n'); const formatted = lines.map(line => `[${line}]()`).join('\n'); popclip.pasteText(formatted);

actions.title: Code Block
actions.javascript: popclip.pasteText("```\n" + popclip.input.text + "\n```");
